means: 当…的评判员（或裁判员、仲裁人）

sentence.Network_en: The international court of justice might be a suitable place to adjudicate claims.
sentence.Network_cn: 国际法庭或许是对所有权作出裁决的合适之地。

sentence.Network_en: The procedures used by administrative agencies to adjudicate individual claims or cases are extremely diverse.
sentence.Network_cn: 行政机关用来裁断有关个人的权利主张或案件的程序千差万别.

sentence.Network_en: Jurisdiction determines which court system should properly adjudicate a case.
sentence.Network_cn: 什么法院体系适合审判某一案件应由管辖权决定.

审字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 审校〖 examineandproofread;review〗 审结〖 adjudicate〗 审理〖 try;bringtotrial〗.
adjudgement 依法判决adjudicate 审理判决adjudicate 宣判

list.abs: 独立请求书 independent claim独立审判 independent adjudication断绝 cease
adjudicate 判决adjudication order 判决令adjudication 判决
行政裁量 administrative discretion行政裁判 administrative adjudication行政程序法 administrative procedure law
3.6行政裁决 administrative adjudication法定行政机关或组织依法对平等主体之间发生的、与行政管理活动密切相关的、特定的民事纠纷进行审查并作出裁.
adjudged bankrupt 被裁定破产adjudicated bankrupt 裁定破产人adjudication fee 裁定费；评定印花税额手续费；评估契据费.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (in the sense 'award judicially'): from Latin adjudicat- 'awarded judicially', from the verb adjudicare (see adjudge)The noun adjudication (as a Scots legal term) dates from the early 17th cent

entry.def: If you adjudicate on a dispute or problem, you make an official judgment or decision about it.

example.ex: ...a commissioner to adjudicate on legal rights...
The international court of justice might be a suitable place to adjudicate claims.
example.tran: 国际法庭或许是对所有权作出裁决的合适之地。

means.word_mean: 1. put on trial or hear a case and sit as the judge at the trial of;

sentences.sentence: "The football star was tried for the murder of his wife"
"The judge tried both father and son in separate trials"

means.word_mean: 2. bring to an end; settle conclusively;

sentences.sentence: "The judge decided the case in favor of the plaintiff"
"The father adjudicated when the sons were quarreling over their inheritance"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Of course a lot more data is needed before we can adjudicate between these two models," Natarajan said.
